document_data.caption: Map showing Torch Lane just north of the [[House of Wonder]].
document_data.name: Torch Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Torch Lane''' was a small road in the [[Sea Ward of Waterdeep|Sea Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] near the [[House of Wonder]].
document_data.Geography: The road ran north to south from [[Ivory Street]] to [[Pharra's Alley]].
document_data.Notable Locations: * This road spanned the western length of the [[Eltorchul Villa]].
